channel.title: Aerotest Operations Inc. (R-098)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: PNO-V-89-022:on 880403,earthquake of magnitude of 4.5 on Richter scale occurred 10 miles northeast of San Jose,CA. Automatic seismic protection did not trigger shutdown. Reactors manually shutdown.No radioactive release occurred.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Advises that 880912,1215 & 890531 changes to Aerotest Radiography & Research Reactor physical security plan consistent w/10CFR50.54(p) & acceptable.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Forwards Exam Rept 50-228/OL-89-01 on 890726-27.Of two employees applying for senior reactor operator licenses,one candidate met min qualification requirements for licensing.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Exam Rept 50-228/OL-89-01 on 890726-27.Exam results:one senior reactor operator candidate passed both written & operating exams & one senior reactor operator candidate failed written & passed operating exam.
item.description: EXAMINATION REPORT, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Requests full accounting of all cost components which make up Invoice H0940.Cost covered in invoice incurred in preparation,presentation & grading of research reactor operator test for two employees.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Responds to 890509 ltr requesting explanation of amount billed to company by Invoice H0940 dtd 890427 for Part 55 operator exams svcs for two employees.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF THE CONTROLLER

item.title: PNO-V-89-047:on 890808,earthquake & aftershock of 5.1 & 4.2 magnitudes,respectively,occurred approx 15 miles southwest of San Jose,CA.Reactors shutdown during earthquake.Tour of GE reactor disclosed no damage.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Forwards addl info re 881216 incident.Caused by designers of TRIGA Mark I.Licensee intends to add cleaning & lubricating rod actuating linkage & cleaning of housing above electrical portion of rod actuating switch to annual maint schedule.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: REED COLLEGE, PORTLAND, OR

item.title: Forwards revised NRC Form 398.Rev reflects changes to 10CFR55 effective on 870526.Revised form requires new applications to complete each category including educ, training & experience.Changes detailed in Encl 2.

item.title: Forwards revised emergency plan.Plan identical to plan submitted & approved by NRC in 1984,save editorial changes to eliminate ambiguity.Updating covers increase in number of operating hours in Section I & employees in Section III.A.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.
